Articles.Content: I only knew about KSP as this insanely entertaining Pc game, then it came out on a machine that I regularly play on, and now I'm busy trying to find out how to build a forward swept wing rocket plane with underwing SRBs. So far I'm having barely any luck with just getting it off the ground.

This was written a while ago, and KSP's aerodynamic model has since been updated so some of the bits about the game's drag model no longer apply, but it's still my favorite tutorial on basic aircraft design.

It helped me a lot when I was getting started. You might find it worth a look. 

Welcome to the forums.

On July 15, 2016 at 4:50 AM, Deafiroth said:

I only knew about KSP as this insanely entertaining Pc game, then it came out on a machine that I regularly play on, and now I'm busy trying to find out how to build a forward swept wing rocket plane with underwing SRBs. So far I'm having barely any luck with just getting it off the ground. 

welcome aboard! Glad to have you here.

Edited July 16, 2016 by Lo Var Lachland

Welcome..... errr.... you do know that the newest member makes the coffee for everyone else? Right?

Coffee.... black... please... OH, and this time... even with the diabetes, I'll have two sugars...

that way, If I get caught with sugar in my coffee, I can blame you.
Welcome! Hopefully we will see your designs on the exchange some day.
